params.minFortOut: Minimum FortUSD (18d) that must be received, for slippage protection.
params.usdcAmount: Amount of USDC (6d) to spend from this contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

backingBps().notice: Returns current backing in bps using Vault.totalBackingUSDC and FortUSD.totalSupply

bufferBps().notice: Returns current buffer (backing - 100%) in bps, floored at 0

bufferUSDC().notice: Returns the USDC buffer (in 6 decimals) and theoretical USDC

buyAndBurn(uint256,uint256).notice: Uses module USDC to buy FortUSD on Aerodrome-style router and burn it.

cooldown().notice: Cooldown in seconds between buyAndBurn calls

lastBuyAndBurn().notice: Last timestamp when buyAndBurn was executed

maxBuyBufferPctBps().notice: Max percentage (in bps) of the USDC buffer that can be used per buyAndBurn

setRoute(address,address,bool,address).notice: Update the default swap route (e.g. if best liquidity moves).

triggerBufferBps().notice: Buffer threshold (in bps) above which buyAndBurn can be triggered (e.g. 2200 = 22%)
